Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project showcased on the Innovators Hub website.

description.description: A detailed description of the project.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image representing the project.

detailsUrl.description: URL to the detailed view of the project.

TeamMember.title: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents a team member (leadership) of the Young Innovators Club.

id.description: Unique identifier for the team member.

name.description: The name of the team member.

role.description: The role of the team member in the club.

imageUrl.description: URL of the team member's profile picture.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event organized or scheduled by the Young Innovators Club.

GalleryItem.title: GalleryItem
GalleryItem.description: Represents an image or media item in the innovation gallery.

id.description: Unique identifier for the gallery item.

title.description: The title or caption of the gallery item.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image in the gallery.

description.description: A short description of the tutorial.

longDescription.description: A more detailed description of the tutorial.

videoUrl.description: URL to the video tutorial (e.g., YouTube embed URL).

blueprintUrl.description: URL to the project blueprint or schematics.

Subscriber.title: Subscriber
Subscriber.description: Represents a subscriber to the newsletter.

email.description: The email address of the subscriber.

subscribedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user subscribed.

ContactFormSubmission.title: ContactFormSubmission
ContactFormSubmission.description: Represents a submission from the contact form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the contact form submission.

name.description: The name of the person submitting the form.

email.description: The email address of the person submitting the form.

message.description: The message content from the form.

submittedAt.description: Timestamp of when the form was submitted.

EnrollmentFormSubmission.title: EnrollmentFormSubmission
EnrollmentFormSubmission.description: Represents a submission from the enrollment form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the enrollment form submission.

fullName.description: The full name of the person submitting the form.

gradeClass.description: The grade or class of the person submitting the form.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the person submitting the form.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the person submitting the form.

interestArea.description: The area of interest selected by the person submitting the form.

reasonForJoining.description: The reason for joining provided by the person submitting the form.

consentGiven.description: Indicates whether consent was given by the person submitting the form.

submittedAt.description: Timestamp of when the form was submitted.

status.description: The status of the enrollment application.

AdminAccess.title: AdminAccess
AdminAccess.description: Represents a user with administrative access. The document ID should be the user's UID.

grantedAt.description: Timestamp of when the access was granted.

/team_members/{teamMemberId}.description: Stores team member profiles. Publicly accessible.

/gallery_items/{galleryItemId}.description: Stores gallery images and associated data. Publicly accessible.

/tutorials/{tutorialId}.description: Stores tutorials. Publicly readable, admin writable.

/subscribers/{subscriberId}.description: Stores newsletter subscriber information. Accessible by admins only.

/contact_form_submissions/{submissionId}.description: Stores contact form submissions. Accessible by admins only.

/applications/{applicationId}.description: Stores enrollment form submissions. Accessible by admins only.

/yic_members_details/{memberId}.description: Stores approved club members. Accessible by admins only.

/admin_access/{userId}.description: Stores users who have admin access to the dashboard. Access is manually granted in the Firebase console. Only other admins can read or write to this collection.
